titleStmt.title: The true copy of a letter from Mr. Harris and Mr. Annesley, two of the East-India-Companies council, left at Surrat by their General, Sir John Child, Barronet, when he and the rest of the English nation departed the Indian shoar [sic], and retired to Bombay to begin the late war against the Great Mogul and his subjects
titleStmt.author: Harris, B. (Bartholomew)

titleStmt.title: The true copy of a letter from Mr. Harris and Mr. Annesley, two of the East-India-Companies council, left at Surrat by their General, Sir John Child, Barronet, when he and the rest of the English nation departed the Indian shoar [sic], and retired to Bombay to begin the late war against the Great Mogul and his subjects
titleStmt.author: Harris, B. (Bartholomew)
Annesley, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Bart. Harris, Samuel Annesley, Surrat, Dec. 25th, 1687. Relative to the negotiations for peace with the Great Mogul.
"Windsor, July 30th, 1688. This may be printed, Middleton"
Reproduction of original in British Library.
